attributes.action: show, and make the case strongly for showing, solidarity with our brothers and sisters in the Iraqi trade union movement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A democracy cannot be imposed by the will of the state alone. It must be nurtured at the roots. 

The trade union movement in Iraq forms a vital, broadly based and non-sectarian front in the struggle to construct civic society. It brings Iraqis together to fight for the common interest of all Iraqis, not just the narrow, chauvinistic interests of Shia or Sunni.

We should show solidarity with our brothers and sisters in the movement, defending them from attack (from both governmental and non-governmental sources) and providing them with the moral and material support they require to help build a democratic and stable Iraq.
